issue.title: [C++] arrow-gcsfs-test is timing out
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16146](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16146). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```

The following tests FAILED:
	101 - arrow-gcsfs-test (Timeout)
```

Appears to have started with [an unrelated minor PR](https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/e047c9a6c9df565b86143036cc6bab26d3a59306). Observed on master and across several PRs.
